column5: I doubt we find leeches next week, but thought I'd ask if anyone may have found them available lately?Also, someone told me Lac Seul is down for this time of year. Anyone have any fresh experience on the lake?Also, anyone going to be staying at Mahkwa next week? If so we will be in House keeping cabin 12.Pooch
Leaving Lac Seul tomorrow. Water levels have been down 2 feet for the past month.
No current info, Pooch, other than www.lwcb.ca for water levels. Check the notice board on the home page. Safe travels to you, on the road and on the water.
Just returned, water is down from the past few years, but not terribly low. Fishing was very good.

If this is true, then the flat that leads around the bend (SW) to Vaughn lake would be nearly dry? I was out that way in late June and we had areas of 1 1/2 to 2 feet in that area. Last weekend I was in Deception Bay and level was down but not 2 feet down from late June. LM
